comments.author: Be Yourself

comments.text:
The meat was delicious, with the thyme and rosemary. But I didn't put 
enough vinegar/liquid so it burned a little. It smells very vinegary during 
the cooking and everyone one was "What the hell is that smell!" but it 
really mellows down at the end. It's a shame that I burned that sauce, it 
was very promising. Good luck with your cooking, make sure to take the meat 
out at 140F, and let it rest, it's the perfect temperature for juicy pork 
loin
comments.author: Jean-Paul Phan
